record.name: Reset Child Incident status when change to normal incident

rule.conditionDesc: ( Parent Incident in CurrentRecord != Parent Incident in SavedRecord)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Parent Incident">parent.incident</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Parent Incident">parent.incident</FieldName></Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Set Status via JavaScript (when ( Parent Incident in CurrentRecord != Parent Incident in SavedRecord))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"setField","fieldName":"problem.status","script":"var pendingStatus = \"Pending Parent Incident\";\u000a\u000aif (vars.$L_file.parent_incident === null) {\u000a\u000a\u0009var defaultStatus = lib.settings.getSettingValue(\"Incident\", \"im.master2child.default.status\");\u000a\u0009if (defaultStatus != null && defaultStatus != \"\" && vars.$L_file.problem_status == pendingStatus) {\u000a\u0009\u0009value = defaultStatus;\u000a\u0009} else {\u000a\u0009\u0009value = vars.$L_file.problem_status;\u000a\u0009}\u000a\u000a}\u000a\u000aif (vars.$L_file_save.parent_incident === null) {\u000a\u000a\u0009value = pendingStatus;\u000a}"}
